attributes.action: pull the UK out of the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Political voting is turning the Eurovision song contest into a joke. We would like to call on the Prime Minister to order the BBC, the contest's biggest financial backer, to cut its funding that it puts into the contest every year until political voting grinds to a halt.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
